column1: Uchi////Excellent place. As someone who doesn't even typically like sushi
column2: this place was an eye opener. Great flavors in all their stuff. Food is cheap in my mind compared to what you get; drinks are what will run up your bill. Food is really great
column3: and it's a bustling place. And I guess it's not really a sushi place. Just go. It's awesome. I've never met anyone who didn't enjoy Uchi.
